scripts.client:build: cd client && npm run build && rm -rf node_modules
scripts.server:build: cd server && npm run build && npm prune
scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "npm run server:compile" "npm run server" "npm run client"
scripts.build: npm run server:build && npm run client:build
scripts.postinstall: npm run server:install && npm run client:install
